text: Karl Harris (21 October 1979 - 3 June 2014) was an English motorcycle racer. He won the British Supersport Championship in 2001. In 2010, he switched to the British Superstock Championship on a GR Motorsport Aprilia. He was born in Sheffield, South Yorkshire. Harris was killed in a racing incident on 3 June 2014 on the Isle of Man. He was 34 and died during the Isle of Man TT. His wife, Jane, outlived him. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1979 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths in sport Category:Road accident deaths in the United Kingdom Category:Sportspeople from Sheffield
title: Karl Harris
